panels.description: Median across replicas in a subnet of the total number of messages across all outgoing streams.

targets.expr:
label_replace(
  quantile by (ic, ic_subnet) (
    0.5,
    sum without(destination, remote) (mr_stream_messages{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"})
  ),
  "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([0-9a-z]+)-.*"
)

panels.title: Cumulative Stream Sizes, by Subnet

panels.description:
Averaged over **$period** (configurable).

Sum by induction status of per-subnet median inducted requests and responses.
panels.title: Induct XNet Message Attempts per Second, by Status

panels.description:
Averaged over **$period** (configurable).

The absolute value depends on how many replicas are selected by Consensus to build blocks, but should be relatively constant over time.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(.9, sum by(ic, status, le, resource) (rate(xnet_endpoint_request_duration_seconds_bucket{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"}[$period])))

panels.title: XNet Endpoint Query Duration 90th Percentile, by Status

panels.description: `/stream` responses and bytes per second, averaged over **$period** (configurable).
panels.title: Throughput, by Subnet

panels.description: `/stream` payload overhead (certification, witness) in bytes and as a percentage, averaged over **$period** (configurable).

targets.expr:
label_replace(
clamp_min(
  (
    sum by(ic, ic_subnet) (rate(xnet_endpoint_response_size_bytes_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance",resource="stream"}[$period]))
  /
    sum by(ic, ic_subnet) (rate(xnet_endpoint_response_size_bytes_count{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance",resource="stream"}[$period]))
  )
-
  (
    sum by(ic, ic_subnet) (rate(xnet_endpoint_slice_payload_size_bytes_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"}[$period]))
  /
    sum by(ic, ic_subnet) (rate(xnet_endpoint_slice_payload_size_bytes_count{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"}[$period]))
  ),
0
),
"ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([0-9a-z]+)-.*"
)

label_replace(
clamp_min(
  1 -
    (
      sum by(ic, ic_subnet) (rate(xnet_endpoint_slice_payload_size_bytes_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"}[$period]))
    /
      sum by(ic, ic_subnet) (rate(xnet_endpoint_slice_payload_size_bytes_count{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"}[$period]))
    )
  /
    (
      sum by(ic, ic_subnet) (rate(xnet_endpoint_response_size_bytes_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance",resource="stream"}[$period]))
    /
      sum by(ic, ic_subnet) (rate(xnet_endpoint_response_size_bytes_count{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance",resource="stream"}[$period]))
    ),
  0
),
"ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([0-9a-z]+)-.*"
)
